ISSUE.TITLE: NotMapped attribute not working into nop4.3 and nop4.4
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 and 4.4 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Add new property into domain class that not exist into table into plugin source code Example 1. Select "GoogleAuthenticator" plugin 2. Add any custom property into GoogleAuthenticatorRecord.cs and set this property as NotMapped attribute. but we dont want to add this property into this table. 3. Now run the project you got error message for this additional property. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10364140/126874513-c28dbcd7-f236-451b-a17f-34728dea31a2.png) I think one condition is missing into FluentMigratorMetadataReader.cs class ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10364140/126032458-ec19d7f0-11e4-4164-8626-19cf13b36c4c.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4948 Added possibility to remove the pre-selected rating value

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5766 Added the ability to ignore a column for mapping (via [NotMapped]/[NotColumn] attributes)
